structure.unit: ARTICLE XXXVIII. IMPOSITION OF MORATORIUM ON EXECUTION OF WATER SUPPLY CONTRACTS

law.catch_line: Determination by Board of necessity of water contract moratorium; recommendations relating to allocation plant, etc.; period of moratorium.

text.section: Sec. 2-355. Determination by Board of necessity of water contract moratorium; recommendations relating to allocation plant, etc.; period of moratorium.
